title: I will be doing a giveaway at OPL Finals!
body:
Hello everyone!

I will be attending the OPL Finals in Brisbane in full Corsair Quinn cosplay, and will be doing a trivia giveaway at the event :) (I will also be trying to film the event)

So if you’re going to the event and want to win a wristband or something a little more exciting then keep a lookout! You will have to answer my questions correctly, and some of them aren’t easy so best bring your A-game >:)

I look forward to seeing you all there!
Sera’s Dragon

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
I love to see people doing this kind of thing ^^

I'm sorry that i won't be there and that ill miss the cosplay of my favourite Quinn skin and the prizes :(

everyone have fun though!
Well that is why I am hopefully going to be able to film it :)

>
> Well that is why I am hopefully going to be able to film it :)

Whats the status on your youtube vids?  I quite enjoyed them.
Family stuff and whole slew of other things came up so it's in a bit of a hiatus. Hopefully after OPL Finals I will start on the videos again (got some good League and OW footage).

I just don't know how I'm going to link em to you. (So you can see what its about)
